name: Been Down So Long
wikiSummary: Been Down So Long is a reference to Richard Farina's novel Been Down So Long That It Looks Like Up To Me (1966) in which the strange college student Gnossos Pappadopoulis encounters everything that makes the sixties the 60s.
wikiText:
Been Down So Long is a reference to Richard Farina's novel Been Down So Long That It Looks Like Up To Me (1966) in which the strange college student Gnossos Pappadopoulis encounters everything that makes the sixties the 60s.
